I am Parent_E, and my top preference is Nursery_E. Since all nurseries have a capacity of 1, and I am the lowest priority applicant across the board (P5), I must try to secure my highest preference where competition is minimized.

- P_D -> N_D

Therefore, applying to my top choice, Nursery_E, is the safest and best strategy to maximize my utility in Round 1.
